alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Jackson; Johnson; Magoffin; Owsley; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 4:39AM EST until January 16 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Two rounds of light snow is expected. The first round will move in late this evening, before tapering off early Monday morning, with generally an inch or less of snowfall expected. The second and more significant round of snow arrives Monday afternoon and will continue through early Tuesday morning. Up to 2 inches of snow is expected, with total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches forecast. * WHERE...Portions of northeast, south central and southeast Kentucky. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions at times, especially Monday afternoon through early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow will be dry and fluffy in nature.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling Sunday night through Tuesday morning. The latest road conditions for Kentucky can be found by visiting https://goky.ky.gov.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Jackson; Johnson; Magoffin; Owsley; Rockcastle
